attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bad luck has caused death and misery throughout the world and the government has yet to do anything about it. It was discovered recently that bad luck can cause diseases such as cancer and blindness as well as making people terrified to leave thier homes in the fear they may be killed by bad luck. Not enough research or funding is being put into eradicating this plague on our society and we think its time the goverment do something about it.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
